# 20th Century Architecture

## Frank Lloyd Wright

The first truly famous architect in America. He was great at marketing and published in all types of magazines. He was an architect for everyone. You could order plans from him for an average person, a small middle class plan. You could for the first time hire and architect to design your house. Wright played a key role in the architectural movements of the twentieth century, influencing generations of architects worldwide through his works. He was helpful on the first major skyscrapers, even though he hates the city.

[![Robie House (Chicago) by Frank Lloyd Wright](https://s3.trueloveserver.com/arthum/Frank_Lloyd_Wright_Robie_House.jfif "Robie House (Chicago) by Frank Lloyd Wright")](https://s3.trueloveserver.com/arthum/Frank_Lloyd_Wright_Robie_House.jfif)His experience with modern material like steel allowed him to do unique designs with cantilevers and large overhangs. He always wanted to work with the surrounding environment, often with a horizontally.

[![Robie House blueprint](https://s3.trueloveserver.com/arthum/robie_house_blueprint.jpg "Robie House Blueprint")](https://s3.trueloveserver.com/arthum/robie_house_blueprint.jpg)

There is a central fire place to the entire building. The hearth and it's place as the nuclear family was important to the house. His middle class house is based around this idea and the nucleus of the family.
